original_text: In you they have treated father and mother with contempt; in you they have oppressed the foreigner and mistreated the fatherless and the widow.
korean_text: 그들이 네 가운데에서 부모를 업신여겼으며 네 가운데에서 나그네를 학대하였으며 네 가운데에서 고아와 과부를 해하였도다

sentences.original_text: In you they have treated father and mother with contempt
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너 안에서 아버지와 어머니를 멸시하였으며

sentences.original_text: in you they have oppressed the foreigner
and mistreated the fatherless and the widow
